TeamOrange.instantmessenger.xmpp

Class BabblerBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • TeamOrange.instantmessenger.xmpp.BabblerBase

  • public class BabblerBase
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the top level interface through which the rest of the app interacts with the server via XMPP.

      • getOccupants

        public java.util.LinkedList<AppOccupant> getOccupants(java.lang.String roomID)
        Gets a LinkedList of Occupants of the chat room, that is people currently in the chat room. assumed "conference.teamorange.space" for the service
        Parameters:
        roomID - the id of the room
        Returns:
        a LinkedList of AppOccupant representing each person int the room

      • createAndOrEnterRoom

        public AppMuc createAndOrEnterRoom(java.lang.String roomID,
                                   java.lang.String nickname,
                                   GetMUCEvent messageEvent)
                            throws ConfideFailedToEnterChatRoomException,
                                   ConfideFailedToConfigureChatRoomException
        Creates a room with the given id, if it doesnt already exist. Enters the room with the given nickname Sets up a message listener and an occupant listener to be connected to the AppMuc object. Adds the occupants of the room to the AppMuc object. assumed "conference.teamorange.space" for the service
        Parameters:
        roomID - the id of the room
        nickname - the nickname to enter with
        Returns:
        an AppMuc object that represents the group chat
        Throws:
        ConfideFailedToConfigureChatRoomException
        ConfideFailedToEnterChatRoomException

        Sends a group message to the room with the given id assumed "conference.teamorange.space" for the service
        Parameters:
        roomID - the id of the room
        message - the message to send
